decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: 40CR_E_Location & Block Plan_P Rev 00 (Existing Location & Block Plan), 40CR_P_Location & Block Plan_P Revision 01 (Proposed Location & Block Plan), 40CR_EP00_P Rev 00 (Existing Ground Floor), 40CR_EP01_P Rev 00 (Existing First Floor), 40CR_EP02_P Rev 00 (Existing Loft Floor), 40CR_EP03_P Rev 00 (Existing Roof Plan), 40CR_EE00_P Rev 00 (Existing Front Elevation), 40CR_EE01_P Rev 00 (Existing Rear Elevation), 40CR_EE02_P Rev 00 (Existing Side Elevation South East), 40CR_EE03_P Rev 00 (Existing Side Elevation South-West), 40CR_ES01_P Rev 00 (Existing Section 01), 40CR_ES02_P Rev 00 (Existing Section 02), 40CR_PP00_P Rev 01 (Proposed Ground Floor), 40CR_PP01_P Rev 01 (Proposed First Floor), 40CR_PP02_P Rev 01 (Proposed Loft Floor), 40CR_PP03_P Rev 01 (Proposed Roof Plan), 40CR_PE00_P Rev 01 (Proposed Front Elevation), 40CR_PE01_P Rev 01 (Proposed Rear Elevation), 40CR_PE02_P Rev 01 (Proposed Side Elevation South East), 40CR_PE03_P Rev 01 (Proposed Side Elevation South West), 40CR_PS01_P Rev 01 (Proposed Section 01), 40CR_PS02_P Rev 01 (Proposed Section 02), 40CR_PS03_P Rev 01 (Proposed Section 03), 40CR_PS04_P Rev 01 (Proposed Section 04), Design and Access Statement prepared by Conrad Margoles Architect and Design and Access Statement Appendix 2 prepared by Conrad Margoles Architect.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | The hereby approved two (2) rooflights to the front roof slope of the dwelling shall not project more than 150mm from the plane of the roof slope when measured perpendicularly and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with policy D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The hereby approved side-facing windows to the second floor, as identified in the south-east and south-west elevations in the approved drawings listed under condition 2, shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
description: Roof extension to main rear roof slope; 2no. roof extensions to main side roof slopes; installation of 7no. photovoltaic panels to roof of existing single storey rear extension; installation of rooflight to front roof slope; replacement windows to first floor rear elevation; and replacement roof tiles
